Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete game architecture restructure with managers and ScriptableObjects

Implemented a complete, scalable architecture for the beat em up 2D game:

## New Systems:
- LevelFlowManager: Controls complete level sequence (cinematics → tutorial → stages → boss)
- CinematicsManager: Handles Timeline and dialogue-based cutscenes with skip functionality
- UIManager: Centralized UI control (HUD, health bars, menus, objectives)
- WaveManager: Advanced enemy spawning system with configurable waves
- BossController: Boss system with multiple phases and special attacks
- TutorialManager: Guided tutorial system with step-by-step instructions
- AudioManager: Centralized audio control with crossfading

## ScriptableObjects (Data-Driven):
- LevelConfigSO: Complete level configuration
- StageConfigSO: Individual stage setup
- WaveConfigSO: Enemy wave configuration
- CinematicConfigSO: Cutscene definitions
- BossConfigSO: Boss stats and phases
- MiniBossConfigSO: Mini-boss configuration
- TutorialConfigSO: Tutorial steps and settings

## UI Components:
- HealthBarUI: Reusable health bar with color transitions
- ScoreUI: Animated score display
- ObjectiveUI: Objective text with fade animations
- TutorialUI: Tutorial instruction display

## Architecture Benefits:
- Clean separation of concerns with manager pattern
- Event-driven communication between systems
- Data-driven design using ScriptableObjects
- Easy to scale and modify without code changes
- All systems work independently and can be tested in isolation

Added comprehensive RESTRUCTURING_GUIDE.md with setup instructions and best practices.
EOF
)")
